Commands.No Mercy: Wind group ranged BRV attack  Deals extra damage to debuffed targets
Commands.Bloodfest: 2-hit group ranged BRV attack + HP attack  Deals proportionate HP damage to each target  All targets: Low chance 3 turns MAX BRV Down I  Deals extra damage to debuffed targets

Passives.No Mercy Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with No Mercy.
Passives.Debuff Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.BRV Guard Up: Slightly raises Defense when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Bloodfest Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Bloodfest.
Passives.Back Attack: Slightly raises BRV Damage when attacking an enemy not targeting self.
Passives.No Mercy Charge: Increases the max uses of No Mercy by 1.
Passives.Debuff Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Bloodfest Charge: Increases the max uses of Bloodfest by 1.
Passives.The Eternal Problem Cadet: Slightly raises BRV damage when using an AoE

Weapons.Hyperion CP: 15: Increases No Mercy's potency and moderately raises BRV damage when there is only one target.Grants a medium probability of inflicting Small Attack Down for 6 turns.
Weapons.Imperial CP: 35: Increases Bloodfest's potency and raises BRV damage when there is only one target.Increases the potency of Max BRV Down, raises its success rate and extends its duration.Grants Small Max BRV Up for 6 turns.
